tables.name: User

columns.name: userId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: username
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN username STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: passwordHashV1
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN passwordHashV1 STRING(MAX)

columns.name: recoveryEmail
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN recoveryEmail STRING(MAX)

columns.name: totalAccounts
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN totalAccounts FLOAT64

columns.name: createdTimeMs
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE User ADD COLUMN createdTimeMs FLOAT64

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE User (userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, username STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, passwordHashV1 STRING(MAX), recoveryEmail STRING(MAX), totalAccounts FLOAT64, createdTimeMs FLOAT64) PRIMARY KEY (userId ASC)

indexes.name: UniqueUsername
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX UniqueUsername ON User(username)

tables.name: Account

columns.name: userId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: accountId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: accountType
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN accountType FLOAT64

columns.name: naturalName
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN naturalName STRING(MAX)

columns.name: description
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN description STRING(MAX)

columns.name: contactEmail
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN contactEmail STRING(MAX)

columns.name: avatarSmallFilename
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN avatarSmallFilename STRING(MAX)

columns.name: avatarLargeFilename
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN avatarLargeFilename STRING(MAX)

columns.name: lastAccessedTimeMs
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN lastAccessedTimeMs FLOAT64

columns.name: createdTimeMs
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN createdTimeMs FLOAT64

columns.name: billingProfileStateVersion
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN billingProfileStateVersion FLOAT64

columns.name: billingProfileState
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN billingProfileState FLOAT64

columns.name: capabilitiesVersion
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN capabilitiesVersion FLOAT64

columns.name: fullText
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE Account ADD COLUMN fullText TOKENLIST AS (TOKENIZE_FULLTEXT(naturalName || ' ' || description)) HIDDEN

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE Account (userId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, accountType FLOAT64, naturalName STRING(MAX), description STRING(MAX), contactEmail STRING(MAX), avatarSmallFilename STRING(MAX), avatarLargeFilename STRING(MAX), lastAccessedTimeMs FLOAT64, createdTimeMs FLOAT64, billingProfileStateVersion FLOAT64, billingProfileState FLOAT64, capabilitiesVersion FLOAT64, fullText TOKENLIST AS (TOKENIZE_FULLTEXT(naturalName || ' ' || description)) HIDDEN) PRIMARY KEY (accountId ASC)

indexes.name: ByUserAndLastAccessTimeMs
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE INDEX ByUserAndLastAccessTimeMs ON Account(userId, lastAccessedTimeMs DESC)

indexes.name: ByFullText
indexes.createIndexDdl: CREATE SEARCH INDEX ByFullText ON Account(fullText)

tables.name: VideoPlayerSettings

columns.name: accountId
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE VideoPlayerSettings ADD COLUMN accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL

columns.name: settings
columns.addColumnDdl: ALTER TABLE VideoPlayerSettings ADD COLUMN settings BYTES(MAX)

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE VideoPlayerSettings (accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, settings BYTES(MAX)) PRIMARY KEY (accountId ASC)

tables.createTableDdl: CREATE TABLE AccountCapabilitiesUpdatingTask (accountId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL, capabilitiesVersion FLOAT64 NOT NULL, retryCount FLOAT64, executionTimeMs TIMESTAMP, createdTimeMs TIMESTAMP) PRIMARY KEY (accountId ASC, capabilitiesVersion ASC)
